ai-tha-ap173:1.2_0: he was born as a great man.

ai-tha-ap173:2.1_0: There the flower-smelling lotuses on the flower

ai-tha-ap173:3.2_0: the Lord of Men, the Lord of Men,
ai-tha-ap173:3.3_0: Having seen a flower in mind,
ai-tha-ap173:4.2_0: to the branch of the gods.
ai-tha-ap173:5.1_0: So far as the Himālayas are seen,
ai-tha-ap173:5.3_0: and the one with gaining black skin,
ai-tha-ap173:5.4_0: he went to the Realized One.

ai-tha-ap173:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kuṭamuna.
